services.name: classic
services.description: Your feet will be pampered, nails are professionally shaped and filed, cuticle trimmer, callus removed, followed by a hot oil massage and finish with a nail buff or polish.

services.name: REFRESHER
services.description: A combination of our Classic Pedicure with an exfoliation pink salt, deep massage with hot stones, warm towel wrap. Finish with a nail buff or polish.
